post.text: Wow! Thank you Louisiana - l love you, and I am with you! Thoughts and prayers are with you, everyday. -DJT

comment.author: Collier
comment.text: I sure didn't see an 18 wheeler showing up from the Clinton Foundation!!! Or the White House, all we got is a bill for his family vacation and golf!

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: Her 18 wheeler was full of e-mails headed for a garbage dump somewhere.

replies.author: Angela
replies.text: Nothing like exploiting a natural disaster for political gain.

replies.author: Collier
replies.text: Angela , he did not do it for political gain!

replies.author: Alison
replies.text: The Clinton foundation is for them only not the American people they hate America!

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: Nothing like using a false non profit for personal gain! Oh did I mention a pay for play scandal, or perhaps a (let me think) Benghazi issue? Angela get your head out of the sand!
